name: Google_s Wordpress Starter Theme
tagline: New Wordpress multipropose starter theme based on Google Web Starter Kit and Underscores & Bootstrap 3.0
body:
### Google_S Wordpress Starter Theme by Altertech.

New Wordpress Starter Theme based on Google Web Started Kit and generated from Underscore.

Here we are back in a new post on the Web platform of the world's most beloved and used WordPress, again with a look at the latest news and guidelines dictated by Google. ``` $ cd bigbabert/google_s $ git fetch origin $ git checkout gh-pages ```

Google_S Wordpress Starter Theme is based on Underscores http://underscores.me/, (C) 2012-2014 Automattic, Inc. and also on Google Web Starter Kit https://developers.google.com/web/starter-kit/, Google.

### Our blog for Q&A

Check it out on our blog: Google_S Wordpress Starter Theme

### Some basic features we have included in the Google_S Starter Theme

  • Various sizes for the thumbnails.
  • A graphic grid for Media Galleries.
  • A custom field to insert text before the image featured in posts and pages.
  • A Right Sidebar fully responsive.
  • A Footer Sidebar with default content.
  • Lightbox for images with link media and slide for tunnels.
  • Simple jquery dropdown sub-menu.
### Authors and Contributors Try our new starter this theme completely responsive and SEO friendly, Google_S made based on Google Web Starter Kit (Node.js, Sass, Gulp). We would be extremely grateful for feedback, reports or suggestions. In the meantime, thank you for reading. Make with love by Bigbabert owner and developer at Altertech Web Solutions, in Milan, Italy. ### Support or Contact We would be very grateful for any feedback on any problems or questions do not hesitate to make the pull-request page on the topic of GitHub.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
